title: The Sage international encyclopedia of mass media and society
subject: Mass media -- Social aspects$$QMass media -- Social aspects -- Encyclopedias
Mass media -- Social aspects
format: 1 online resource (5 volumes (3864 pages)) : illustrations, tables
description: "The SAGE International Encyclopedia of Mass Media and Society discusses media around the world in their varied forms-newspapers, magazines, radio, television, film, books, music, websites, social media, mobile media-and describes the role of each in both mirroring and shaping society. This encyclopedia provides a thorough overview of media within social and cultural contexts, exploring the development of the mediated communication industry, mediated communication regulations, and societal interactions and effects"-- Provided by publisher
contributor: Merskin, Debra L., editor.$$QMerskin, Debra L.
